timestamp.description: The date+timstamp which identifies the point in time, where the information was generated, including milliseconds.

name.description:
The name of the outlet table.
Format: [tablename.key.timestamp]+
Example: ZIELTAB.201446.20180222100409

A unique key inside the sort plan to identify this occurrence of OutletGroup.
Bezeichnung f√ºr eine Gruppe der Endstellen. Dateninhalt ist das Virtuelle Ziel. Das virtuelle Ziel ist eine 3-stellige Zahl.

tray.description:
Tray number. Feld nur relevant, wenn mehrere Sorter eingesetzt werden. 
Nummer vom Sorter. Feld nur relevant, wenn mehrere Sorter eingesetzt werden.

specialType.description: Defines the usage made of the outlet group.

priority.description:
Priority of the outlet. Defaults to 1=Highest Priority.

If multiple outlets have the same priority, round robin is applied. Lower priority outlets are only used
when higher priority outlets are full.

outlets.description: The list of physical outlets to be used.

items.description: Groupings of physical outlets for each sequencing pass.
